properties.name: Snapology
properties.description: Empowering a global franchise to share the magic of STEM with our children.
properties.body:
I inherited this project from another design firm. When I received the project it consisted of a 5-page clickable prototype and a list of functionality.

I worked with the founders and their first franchise, helping them create a design system that could scale with their platform.

I lead the team of designers and programmers responsible for implementing this system. The team has created a responsive, contact and event management system that plugs into a custom e-commerce store. The system enables franchise owners to manage each of their franchises through a single interface.
properties.exit: The Snapology Manager and Commerce system is an on going project and is set to continue UI revisions and new feature development into 2019.
